All functions

pa_ask_user_transform_files()
Prompt User for Transformation Decision with Options
pa_brand_color_get()
Get a color by name or index.
pa_brand_color_scale()
Custom scale_color_manual using brand colors from YAML
pa_brand_colors_get()
Get a named brand color from the config.
pa_brand_theme()
A ggplot2 theme that applies brand styling from the YAML config.
pa_config_level_values_get()
Retrieve all values with a specific key from the same hierarchy level
pa_config_value_get()
Get config value from YAML file with hierarchy support
pa_config_value_set()
Set config value in YAML file with hierarchy support

TEMPORARY Retrieve the Staging Path for a Dataset

left pad material numbers
pa_matn1_output()
remove leading zeros

pa_model_accuracy()
calculate forecast accuracy metrics
pa_palette_get()
Get a palette color from the config by index.

preview the header of a parquet file
pa_su_config_reset()
